1096610.name: Incident Commander
1096610.description:
A small town faces a big problem, and the crisis will only get worse unless you step in. As Incident Commander, you deploy and coordinate responder teams from multiple organizations to deal with a sudden threat to the town’s citizens and property.

Incident Commander uses a light-hearted approach to the Incident Command System. The focus is on operations. Players control police, fire, EMS, air operations, school, CERT, and public works units in real-time to deal with the emerging disaster.



The game supports one to four players. A tutorial and nine scenarios provide many types of challenges, including fires, chemical spills, electrical hazards, active shooter, casualty collection, and more. The town mayor will keep an eye on your progress and track Public Safety and Incident Budget. Are you up to the task, Commander?

key Features

  • Bird’s-eye view of 3D world with animations and special effects such as damage from fires, toppled utility poles, chemical spills, and explosions
  • High quality sound effects and voice acting helps bring the action to life!
  • Deploy and control police, fire crew, EMS and dozens of vehicles to contain and neutralize incidents over 9 unique missions
  • Includes 20 different types of teams and their vehicles, from School Resource Officer to HAZMAT
  • Cooperative multiplayer feature supports up to four players
  • Get a grip on the mayhem and keep the situation under control with Mission Objectives
  • Access and challenge your own best public safety and incident budget scores directly from the cloud
1096610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
